overview: The attraction felt between two women is heightened more than ever when Sarah, a high maintenance woman who routinely applies a mask of makeup in an attempt to hide her insecurities, meets Helen – an au-natural woman who is comfortable in her own skin. A classic morning after the night before scenario, but this isn’t a drunken mistake, this is a whole new way of life. Reflection, awkwardness and burgeoning love as two women.  Pretty is a film about beauty, not just the physical representation, but the soul deep beauty that makes us human. It is a story about finding confidence, revealing the true you.
title: Pretty
